title: [1.7.10/1.7.2][ssp/smp]Plants-To-Ores 植物矿石mod------链接已补
author: ccxz
txt_content:
本帖最后由 ccxz 于 2016-9-27 21:54 编辑 
这个mod可以合成许多矿石种子，种植可收获相应矿物
Competition 
My and my friend decided to have our own competition and mod against each other.The time deadline was 6 hours,my firend sadly dropped out on the 5th hour as he had lost all his data (Should of backed up!) 
This mod was made in 6 hrs,So report bugs and it is pretty simple! i will add detail on a later date! :) 

What? 
This mod adds Ore seeds which can be planted to grow different type of ores to your designated seed :) (Not realistic i know!) 

Crafting! 
The crafting recipe for these seeds are above in the pictures! each one has there own block in the recipe e.g Diamond Block = Diamond Seeds, Emerald Block = Emerald Seeds and etc.  

OreSeeds 
The seeds go from Coal,Iron,Gold,Diamond,Emerald,Redstone and Lapis! 

Planting! 
Basically hoe where you want to place you chosen OreSeed and place it! The stem is like the pumpkin and melon stem. you have to either have a free spot left, right, infront, behind. 

Patience! 
After a long time! your seed will grow and place a ore beside the stem,when you collect it the stem will stay in the same stage and produce more ores! 

??? 

Profit! 
Unlimited farm of ores to your command! (Well depending on if its fullt grown). 
以上为原帖介绍




======================[bone_meal]图片时间[bone_meal]=================

没错···你没看错，就是这样，蓝色的可以种出青金石，黑色煤炭，蓝色是喜闻乐见的钻石
绿色是绿宝石，金色时黄金，银色的是铁，红色的是红石
就像这样


当然合成是好贱的


想要什么种子就在中间放什么矿物块
好了······也就是这些下载地址
为防和谐，密码: nygt

replies.txt_content: 我是玩工业2实验版的，我有个目标是合成25*25=625个高级风力扩展的2048EU/T的风力发电机作为一个大型能量工厂，而一个风力发电机将消耗12*64*16=12288个铁，其他消耗我还没算，玩了快一个月了，和成了10台风力发电机和10台UU机，我离目标太远了，天天挖矿的日子太难受，橡胶林都是一大片却还是会缺橡胶，更不说锡矿，我了个天，有了这个我感觉自己即将解脱
